component_text.text: Province Capital Owner:
Court Unity

tx_confederate.component_level_text: You have confederated all available High Elf factions!

component_text.text: In affairs internal, act like practical Caradryel coalescer of Ulthuan's strength. Echo triumphant Caledor, builder of the fortress-gates. Embody sagely Bel-Hathor, the stubborn but resolute wizard-Prince. Only then, once all is in careful balance with the ever-shifting favours of the Phoenix King's Court, may the disparate children of Kurnous and Isha be unified under one banner.\n\n[[col:yellow]]Enable [[img:icon_confederation]][[/img]]confederations with fellow Asur factions by holding the required Tier 3 Patronage positions, along with the required level of [[img:icon_hef_favour]][[/img]]Favour with the Phoenix King. Confederating defeated factions grants their leader for recruitment.[[/col]]
Fulfil the following conditions to enable Confederation with the selected faction:
On your next you will claim this position with:
This faction will claim the position on your next turn:
Duration of Patronage immunity from threats:
Engage in Intrigue
